name: Bun N' Gun: One Shot in the West
name_original: Bun N' Gun: One Shot in the West
description:
NOTE: I recommend downloading the desktop version since it runs better and has a custom target cursor.

Reisen has been raisin' some trouble in bun country.
Play through several stages full of standoffs and gunfights.
But if you get shot in any round, you gotta restart the stage. Think carefully before you draw your gun, bun.

Point and click to draw/aim, A and D to strafe.
